div.div: Beginning next week (April 28) the school office hours will be 9:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. , Tuesday through Friday, closed on Mondays. If you are picking items up from the school, please only come during these times.

h3.img: Updates on COVID-19 situationTop of Page

h5.span: Janesville School has made the decision to remain closed to students for the rest of the year. Distance Learning and meal delivery information is on our website or you can call the office from 8 to 4 Monday through Friday beginning April 13. Information regarding computer checkouts will be coming later this week.

h4.strong: Please continue to check back for future updates and alerts.

h5.a: Affordable Internet Programs and Public WiFi Resources.pdf

div.class: dashboard-container container row-zero clearfix text-center font-m

figcaption.p: Our school is a beautifully maintained campus nestled in the tree line of the Southern Cascades.
Our Board of Trustees provides a long-range vision and plans for district programs, activities and operations.
Parent involvement positively affects parents, teachers and our whole school. Join our PTO today!

div.h4: Are you a student, parent, or community member? Keep in touch with us:
